title: monday.com
description:
Used by 180K+ global customers, monday.com is a customizable and easy-to-use work management platform that maximizes efficiency, boosts collaboration, and increases productivity.
Easily plan, centralize, streamline, and automate your teams' work and projects by utilizing powerful features such as no-code automations, real-time notifications, customizable dashboards, 200+ pre-made templates, multiple views, 72+ integrations, and more. From idea to execution, manage it all on one robust platform.
